category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEAccountabilityCheckPropertiesInHierarchy
preference.preference_description: Lists the BOMLine properties to be concatenated for each parent in the value of the property "Hierarchy From Root" (mfg0BlHierarchyFromRoot), which is a concatenation of all parents of a BOMLine. Valid Values: Accepts multiple strings as values. Each string must be a valid property of the parent BOMLine.
